name.zh_cn: 第二篇-虚假的圣所攻略战

desc.en: Six ominous towers have been erected in Kivotos. Can Sensei and their students protect Academy City from the threat of the Chroma and overcome the False Sanctums?
desc.jp: Six ominous towers have been erected in Kivotos. Can Sensei and their students protect Academy City from the threat of the Chroma and overcome the False Sanctums?
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯突然出现了六座高塔。天空被不祥的赤红笼罩，未曾出现的威胁向奇普托斯袭来——老师能够顺利解决这个状况吗？

desc.en: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.jp: 奇普託斯因為突如其來的異常現象而陷入混亂。老師使用大人的卡片企圖收拾眼前的混亂狀況。來歷不明的存在出現在老師面前，並且留下了耐人尋味的忠告。
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯因为突如其来的异常现象而陷入混乱。老师使用大人的卡片企图收拾眼前的混乱状况。来历不明的存在出现在老师面前，并且留下了耐人寻味的忠告。

desc.en: 陽奈和亞子發現天空變紅。
desc.jp: 陽奈和亞子發現天空變紅。

desc.en: 優香詢問乃愛關於莉音的蹤跡，後者表示還沒有找到。優香表示自己將先出發一步。
desc.jp: 優香詢問乃愛關於莉音的蹤跡，後者表示還沒有找到。優香表示自己將先出發一步。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}询问{cf乃爱}关于{cf莉音}的踪迹，后者表示还没有找到。{cf优香}表示自己将先出发一步。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 花子聽說有急事後來到茶會所在的陽臺，見到了茶會的渚、修女會的櫻子和救援騎士團的美禰。花子希望大家能夠一起齊心協力，即便派系不同。
desc.jp: 花子聽說有急事後來到茶會所在的陽臺，見到了茶會的渚、修女會的櫻子和救援騎士團的美禰。花子希望大家能夠一起齊心協力，即便派系不同。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}听说有急事后来到{cn茶会}所在的阳台，见到了{cn茶会}的{cf渚}、{cn修女会}的{cf樱子}和救援骑士团的{cf美祢}。{cf花子}希望大家能够一起齐心协力，即便派系不同。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: 完成任務的眾人發現天空變紅了。就在這時他們收到老師的訊息。

desc.zh_cn: 完成任务的众人发现天空变红了。就在这时他们收到老师的消息。

desc.en: 詩音向電視螢幕前的所有人報道稱，DU白鳥區出現不明情況，有一個巨大的塔從天空落下且正中聖所之塔。隨後是一些現場的情況。
desc.jp: 詩音向電視螢幕前的所有人報道稱，DU白鳥區出現不明情況，有一個巨大的塔從天空落下且正中聖所之塔。隨後是一些現場的情況。
desc.zh_cn: 诗音向电视屏幕前的所有人报道称，DU白鸟区出现不明情况，有一个巨大的塔从天空落下且正中圣所之塔。随后是一些现场的情况。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。

desc.en: 站在夏萊的頂樓上，老師遇見了黑色西裝人。黑服說他所在的組織已被摧毀，而色彩將“胡狼神”扭曲為“阿努比斯”反轉為其恐怖的一面，而後者也遵循著其命運的指導，給基沃託斯帶來終結。
desc.jp: 站在夏萊的頂樓上，老師遇見了黑色西裝人。黑服說他所在的組織已被摧毀，而色彩將“胡狼神”扭曲為“阿努比斯”反轉為其恐怖的一面，而後者也遵循著其命運的指導，給基沃託斯帶來終結。
desc.zh_cn: 站在{et夏莱}的顶楼上，老师遇见了{cf黑色西装人}。黑服说他所在的组织已被摧毁，而色彩将“胡狼神”扭曲为“阿努比斯”反转为其恐怖的一面，而后者也遵循着其命运的指导，给基沃托斯带来终结。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，自己雖然先前認為色彩沒有意識、無法理解，但在這次行動中，他們卻明顯感覺到色彩具有了意識和意義――色彩試圖吸收基沃託斯所有崇高和神祕的概念，將其化為己有。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，自己虽然先前认为色彩没有意识、无法理解，但在这次行动中，他们却明显感觉到色彩具有了意识和意义――色彩试图吸收基沃托斯所有崇高和神秘的概念，将其化为己有。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，出現在基沃託斯的六座塔大概可以算作是聖所之塔的一種變體，其將會把色彩的光散播到整個基沃託斯，扭曲所有人。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，出现在基沃托斯的六座塔大概可以算作是圣所之塔的一种变体，其将会把色彩的光散播到整个基沃托斯，扭曲所有人。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.zh_cn: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 黑服表示，自己的組織受到色彩攻擊，可能是由於色彩想要奪走他們的技術。他提到他們稱代表色彩意志的存在為“色彩的嚮導者”，其名為“誘騙者”。
desc.jp: 黑服表示，自己的組織受到色彩攻擊，可能是由於色彩想要奪走他們的技術。他提到他們稱代表色彩意志的存在為“色彩的嚮導者”，其名為“誘騙者”。
desc.zh_cn: 黑服表示，自己的组织受到色彩攻击，可能是由于色彩想要夺走他们的技术。他提到他们称代表色彩意志的存在为“色彩的向导者”，其名为“诱骗者”。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.en: 基沃託斯各地都出現了敵人。
desc.jp: 基沃託斯各地都出現了敵人。
desc.zh_cn: 基沃托斯各地都出现了敌人。

desc.en: 詩音向大螢幕前的所有人通報即時的新聞動態，提到塔的情況尚不清楚，基沃託斯各地也出現了來源不明的兵力。隨後夏萊的通知抵達，其中明確表明各自治區的學生立即避難，切勿靠近黑色高塔。
desc.jp: 詩音向大螢幕前的所有人通報即時的新聞動態，提到塔的情況尚不清楚，基沃託斯各地也出現了來源不明的兵力。隨後夏萊的通知抵達，其中明確表明各自治區的學生立即避難，切勿靠近黑色高塔。
desc.zh_cn: 诗音向大屏幕前的所有人通报即时的新闻动态，提到塔的情况尚不清楚，基沃托斯各地也出现了来源不明的兵力。随后{et夏莱}的通知抵达，其中明确表明各自治区的学生立即避难，切勿靠近黑色高塔。

desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.jp: 學生們收到老師的聯絡後一一前往聯邦學生會。為了解決眼前的狀況，以琳為首收集情報與建立作戰計劃。為了拯救暴露在聖所的人，老師和聖亞開始尋找{cf葛葉}。聽到訊息後，仁耶表示搜尋{cf葛葉}的任務交給自己。
desc.zh_cn: 学生们收到老师的联系后一一前往联邦学生会。为了解决眼前的状况，以{cf琳}为首收集情报与创建作战计划。为了拯救暴露在圣所的人，老师和{cf圣亚}开始寻找{cf葛叶}。听到消息后，仁耶表示搜索{cf葛叶}的任务交给自己。

desc.en: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.jp: 對策委員會一行人在列車站遇見了虛弱的白子。白子與她們發生了戰鬥，隨後倒地。星野詢問白子來自哪裡，白子回答不知道。
desc.zh_cn: {cn对策委员会}一行人在列车站遇见了虚弱的{cf白子}。{cf白子}与她们发生了战斗，随后倒地。{cf星野}询问{cf白子}来自哪里，{cf白子}回答不知道。

desc.en: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.jp: The 55th track in Blue Archive, notable in Volume 3. It is also connected with Azusa, who was regretting badly for "killing" members of Arius Squad.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第五十五首曲子，在第三篇故事中尤为明显。其经常与梓联系起来，后者当时与阿里乌斯(奧利斯)小队作战时因自己“杀了人”而自责。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.jp: 聯邦學生會的琳由於被撤職且處於不被信任狀態，因而不得不拜託夏萊釋出召集命令。琳隨後拜託桃香和步代她處理在這期間的事情。
desc.zh_cn: 联邦学生会的{cf琳}由于被撤职且处于不被信任状态，因而不得不拜托{et夏莱}发布召集命令。{cf琳}随后拜托{cf桃香}和{cf步}代她处理在这期间的事情。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.jp: 佳世子、優香、亞子、花子和綾音陸續趕到。有人詢問老師的情況，得到的回答是老師正在DU交戰，稍後會回來一趟。大家前往會議室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf佳世子}、{cf优香}、{cf亚子}、{cf花子}和{cf绫音}陆续赶到。有人询问老师的情况，得到的回答是老师正在DU交战，稍后会回来一趟。大家前往会议室。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 琳開始準備會議，搭載著老師的直升機也正在趕來。來到的代表們拿到資料後，開始與自己學院的其他成員確認情況。
desc.jp: 琳開始準備會議，搭載著老師的直升機也正在趕來。來到的代表們拿到資料後，開始與自己學院的其他成員確認情況。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}开始准备会议，搭载着老师的直升机也正在赶来。来到的代表们拿到资料后，开始与自己学院的{sn其他}成员确认情况。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

desc.en: 琳指出他們的目標是在兩週內破壞掉那些塔――她目前將其稱為“虛假的聖所”，意義不言自明。
desc.jp: 琳指出他們的目標是在兩週內破壞掉那些塔――她目前將其稱為“虛假的聖所”，意義不言自明。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}指出他们的目标是在两周内破坏掉那些塔――她目前将其称为“虚假的圣所”，意义不言自明。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.jp: The 101th track in Blue Archive OST, used especially during the battle of the event "The Ark of Atrahasis Conquest."
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第101首曲子，在最终篇第三章占领方舟的活动战斗任务里使用。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.jp: Rin is the Vice President of the General Student Council. She appears in the Tutorial and Volume Final.
desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.jp: 陰陽部表示，葛葉並不在百鬼夜行的學生名冊上，但提到有一個地方記載了相關內容：在百鬼夜行尚未成立時，葛葉設立了“百花繚亂”以調停紛爭。儘管目前仍有傳言百花繚亂的委員長會直接聽命於她，但由於百花繚亂的正副委員長已經長時間無法聯絡，因而百花繚亂即將被廢部――在似乎無望之際，仁耶提出了一個方法。
desc.zh_cn: {cn阴阳部}表示，{cf葛业}并不在{sn百鬼夜行}的学生名册上，但提到有一个地方记载了相关内容：在{sn百鬼夜行}尚未成立时，{cf葛业}设立了“百花缭乱”以调停纷争。尽管目前仍有传言百花缭乱的委员长会直接听命于她，但由于百花缭乱的正副委员长已经长时间无法联络，因而百花缭乱即将被废部――在似乎无望之际，仁耶提出了一个方法。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.jp: Niya is a student of Yin-Yang Club.
desc.zh_cn: 仁耶是阴阳部的一名成员。

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 攻略聖所的作戰開始了。對策委員會與便利屋68分配在阿拜多斯沙漠；C&C、英美、弦生和イチカ分配在千年廢墟地區；遊戲開發部、陽奈和RABBIT小隊分配在史林皮亞等待命令。
desc.jp: 攻略聖所的作戰開始了。對策委員會與便利屋68分配在阿拜多斯沙漠；C&C、英美、弦生和イチカ分配在千年廢墟地區；遊戲開發部、陽奈和RABBIT小隊分配在史林皮亞等待命令。
desc.zh_cn: 攻略圣所的作战开始了。{cn对策委员会}与{cn便利屋68}分配在{sn阿拜多斯}沙漠；{cnC&C}、{cf英美}、{cf弦生}和{cf一花}分配在{sn千年}废墟地区；{cn游戏开发部}、{cf阳奈}和{cnRABBIT小队}分配在史林皮亚等待命令。

desc.en: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.jp: 優香對這兩人居然因為分組而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在兩人不肯讓步的情況下，優香勒令兩人用猜拳的方式決定，否則計劃就要趕不上了。無奈，兩人只好以此決勝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf优香}对这两人居然因为分组而吵架而感到有些小震撼。在两人不肯让步的情况下，{cf优香}勒令两人用猜拳的方式决定，否则计划就要赶不上了。无奈，两人只好以此决胜。

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.

蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.jp: 沙織的加入讓聚集在一起的奧利斯小隊也迴應了老師的召集。修女會和救護騎士團在第4聖所待機。儘管攻略第5聖所的過程中遇到了困境，但後來溫泉開發部和被釋放的小雪伸出了援手。接著第6聖所也完成了居民的避難處理。仁耶向忍術研究部轉達前往雪原搜尋百花繚亂部長的任務。
desc.zh_cn: {cf沙织}的加入让聚集在一起的{cn奥利斯小队}也回应了老师的召集。{cn修女会}和{cn救护骑士团}在第4圣所待机。尽管攻略第5圣所的过程中遇到了困境，但后来{cn温泉开发部}和被释放的{cf小雪}伸出了援手。接着第6圣所也完成了居民的避难处理。仁耶向{cn忍术研究部}转达前往雪原搜索百花缭乱部长的任务。

desc.en: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.jp: 奧利斯小隊也收到了老師的訊息，但日和擔心他們處於通緝狀態，這樣會給老師帶來麻煩。就在這時眾人聽到一陣奇怪的聲音。
desc.zh_cn: {cn奥利斯小队}也收到了老师的消息，但{cf日和}担心他们处于通缉状态，这样会给老师带来麻烦。就在这时众人听到一阵奇怪的声音。

desc.en: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.jp: The 105th track in Blue Archive OST, especially known for usages with the students from Arius Satellite School.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，尤其用于阿里乌斯(奥利斯)分校的学生。

desc.en: 眾人發現一個奇怪的頭盔圈正在向他們靠近。未等確認身份，美咲就開了槍。奇怪的頭盔圈忙脫下帽子，原來是沙織。
desc.jp: 眾人發現一個奇怪的頭盔圈正在向他們靠近。未等確認身份，美咲就開了槍。奇怪的頭盔圈忙脫下帽子，原來是沙織。
desc.zh_cn: 众人发现一个奇怪的头盔圈正在向他们靠近。未等确认身份，{cf美咲}就开了枪。奇怪的头盔圈忙脱下帽子，原来是{cf沙织}。

desc.en: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.jp: 貝裡塔斯回報稱，由於霍德鑽進了堡壘都市地下，而那裡被莉音的系統保護著，無法探測；他們正在破譯密碼，但耗時會比較長。真紀聽後有點驚訝，但乃愛讓真紀繼續專注於第一聖所。
desc.zh_cn: {cn贝里塔斯}回报称，由于霍德钻进了堡垒都市地下，而那里被{cf莉音}的系统保护着，无法探测；他们正在破译密码，但耗时会比较长。{cf真纪}听后有点惊讶，但{cf乃爱}让{cf真纪}继续专注于第一圣所。

desc.en: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.jp: 陽葵突然接入通訊，表示她記得曾經有人偽造過千年的債券，而相關的系統就是由莉音設計。千尋以為是陽葵所作，但後者表示另有其人。乃愛聽後呼叫了優香，而優香讓乃愛來一趟反省室。
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}突然接入通讯，表示她记得曾经有人伪造过{sn千年}的债券，而相关的系统就是由{cf莉音}设计。{cf千寻}以为是{cf阳葵}所作，但后者表示另有其人。{cf乃爱}听后呼叫了{cf优香}，而{cf优香}让{cf乃爱}来一趟反省室。

desc.en: 優香和乃愛打開了反省室的門，把小雪弄了出來。小雪以為兩人要把她另外帶走教育，不過兩人則表示並不是為了繼續追究上次的事。優香指出他們需要小雪的計算能力。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 供給部的風華和茱莉分別負責煮飯和食物的分發。風華提到這樣下去食材很可能不夠，這時他們聽到了車聲。
desc.jp: 供給部的風華和茱莉分別負責煮飯和食物的分發。風華提到這樣下去食材很可能不夠，這時他們聽到了車聲。
desc.zh_cn: {cn供给部}的{cf风华}和{cf茱莉}分别负责煮饭和食物的分发。{cf风华}提到这样下去食材很可能不够，这时他们听到了车声。

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: 美食研究會眾人開著供給部的卡車前來支援，為他們帶來了很多魚――雖然貌似是透過把水抽乾的方式得到。不論如何，食材算是解決了。
desc.jp: 美食研究會眾人開著供給部的卡車前來支援，為他們帶來了很多魚――雖然貌似是透過把水抽乾的方式得到。不論如何，食材算是解決了。

举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.jp: Ayumu is a member of the General Student Council.
desc.zh_cn: 步是联邦学生会的一名成员。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.jp: 補課部的梓和日步美被安排到了在第六聖所周邊執行巡邏的任務。梓對保護日步美一事很有信心。日步美與梓約定，在戰鬥結束後，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特攝電影。
desc.zh_cn: {cn补课部}的{cf梓}和{cf日步美}被安排到了在第六圣所周边执行巡逻的任务。{cf梓}对保护{cf日步美}一事很有信心。{cf日步美}与{cf梓}约定，在战斗结束后，一起去看佩洛洛大人的特摄电影。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: 一切都準備就緒了。老師告知聖所攻略戰與自治區防禦戰已經開始了。
desc.jp: 一切都準備就緒了。老師告知聖所攻略戰與自治區防禦戰已經開始了。

desc.en: 琳、桃香和步共同向所有人重申了戰鬥重點：確保能與敵人直接交戰、清除進攻路線上的阻礙，同時防範敵人突然在各地區出現，最後一同攻略第六聖所。戰鬥的總指揮將交由夏萊處理。
desc.jp: 琳、桃香和步共同向所有人重申了戰鬥重點：確保能與敵人直接交戰、清除進攻路線上的阻礙，同時防範敵人突然在各地區出現，最後一同攻略第六聖所。戰鬥的總指揮將交由夏萊處理。
desc.zh_cn: {cf琳}、{cf桃香}和{cf步}共同向所有人重申了战斗重点：确保能与敌人直接交战、清除进攻路线上的阻碍，同时防范敌人突然在各地区出现，最后一同攻略第六圣所。战斗的总指挥将交由{et夏莱}处理。

desc.en: 為了防禦格黑娜學園四周而聚集在一起的風紀委員會。除了攻略第3聖所的陽奈之外，所有成員都聚在一起了。風紀委員會雖然期待萬魔殿能給予支援，但出現在眼前的皐月卻未能給予風紀委員會太大的幫助。
desc.jp: 為了防禦格黑娜學園四周而聚集在一起的風紀委員會。除了攻略第3聖所的陽奈之外，所有成員都聚在一起了。風紀委員會雖然期待萬魔殿能給予支援，但出現在眼前的皐月卻未能給予風紀委員會太大的幫助。
desc.zh_cn: 为了防御{sn格黑娜}学园四周而聚集在一起的{cn风纪委员会}。除了攻略第3圣所的{cf阳奈}之外，所有成员都聚在一起了。{cn风纪委员会}虽然期待{cn万魔殿}能给予支持，但出现在眼前的皐月却未能给予{cn风纪委员会}太大的帮助。

desc.en: 風紀委員會（除陽奈）一起參與了戰鬥工作。
desc.jp: 風紀委員會（除陽奈）一起參與了戰鬥工作。
desc.zh_cn: {cn风纪委员会}（除{cf阳奈}）一起参与了战斗工作。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic and are able to render such "atmosphere" (be noted that this tag emphasizes the "rendered atmosphere".) Example: Tech N Tech, NRG FielD (Mechanical Jungle doesn't belong to this tag.)
desc.zh_cn: 通常战斗曲都带有这种风格并能够渲染出这种【氛围】（注意：这个标签只强调的是氛围感）。举例/联想：Tech N Tech、NRG FielD（Mechanical Jungle不属于这个标签）

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.jp: 為了防禦三一學園周圍，三一也配合實現正義部、圖書委員會和自衛隊等各自的角色分別去讓一般民眾避難，以及狙擊敵人等。出乎意外的是，連茶會也參加了，戰況變得有些激烈。
desc.zh_cn: 为了防御{sn三一}学园周围，{sn三一}也配合{cn实现正义部}、{cn图书委员会}和自卫队等各自的角色分别去让一般民众避难，以及狙击敌人等。出乎意外的是，连{cn茶会}也参加了，战况变得有些激烈。

desc.en: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.jp: 主要成員集合的學園附近大致上已經整頓好了，但小春在遺蹟地帶附近陷入苦戰當中。茶會的彌香突然登場，讓戰況開始出現了逆轉。
desc.zh_cn: 主要成员集合的学园附近大致上已经整顿好了，但{cf小春}在遗迹地带附近陷入苦战当中。{cn茶会}的{cf弥香}突然登场，让战况开始出现了逆转。

desc.en: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.jp: 小春等實現正義部的成員都向彌香道謝。
desc.zh_cn: {cf小春}等{cn实现正义部}的成员都向{cf弥香}道谢。

desc.en: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.jp: 雖然一邊已經打完了戰鬥，但聖亞感覺到教堂附近還有人沒有撤離。蓮實讓麻白確認情況，果真如此。
desc.zh_cn: 虽然一边已经打完了战斗，但{cf圣亚}感觉到教堂附近还有人没有撤离。{cf莲实}让{cf麻白}确认情况，果真如此。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.en: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.jp: Seia is a student from Tea Party of Trinity, who possessed the ability to foretell the future (deprived by Kuzunoha in Volume Final). She could see the future and interact/talk with people in her dreams.
desc.zh_cn: 圣亚是来自三一茶会的一名学生，具备预见未来的能力（但在最终篇中被葛业剥夺）。她可以在梦中预见未来并与其中的人互动交流。

desc.en: 為了攻略第4聖所，花子和修女會聚集在地下墓穴內部的宗座聖殿前。連奧利斯小隊也一起參戰了。後來穿著聖徒會服裝的櫻子也加入，並且開始攻略第4聖所。
desc.jp: 為了攻略第4聖所，花子和修女會聚集在地下墓穴內部的宗座聖殿前。連奧利斯小隊也一起參戰了。後來穿著聖徒會服裝的櫻子也加入，並且開始攻略第4聖所。
desc.zh_cn: 为了攻略第4圣所，{cf花子}和{cn修女会}聚集在地下墓穴内部的宗座圣殿前。连{cn奥利斯小队}也一起参战了。后来穿着圣徒会服装的{cf樱子}也加入，并且开始攻略第4圣所。

desc.en: 花子指出目前通往第四聖所的道路只有一條，恐怕難以集中火力。救援騎士團、修女會進行戰鬥，奧利斯小隊則主動請纓擔任後方防禦。
desc.jp: 花子指出目前通往第四聖所的道路只有一條，恐怕難以集中火力。救援騎士團、修女會進行戰鬥，奧利斯小隊則主動請纓擔任後方防禦。
desc.zh_cn: {cf花子}指出目前通往第四圣所的道路只有一条，恐怕难以集中火力。救援骑士团、{cn修女会}进行战斗，{cn奥利斯小队}则主动请缨担任后方防御。

desc.en: 忍術研究部為了執行特殊任務來到了大雪原。但出現在眼前的無名守護者比想像中還要多，一行人因此陷入了危機當中…出乎意料的援軍突然從天而降。
desc.jp: 忍術研究部為了執行特殊任務來到了大雪原。但出現在眼前的無名守護者比想像中還要多，一行人因此陷入了危機當中…出乎意料的援軍突然從天而降。
desc.zh_cn: {cn忍术研究部}为了运行特殊任务来到了大雪原。但出现在眼前的无名守护者比想像中还要多，一行人因此陷入了危机当中…出乎意料的援军突然从天而降。

desc.en: 萬魔殿的加入讓忍術研究部得以脫離險境。一行人再次踏上旅程去執行特殊任務。基於認為任務已經完成，萬魔殿便回去了。
desc.jp: 萬魔殿的加入讓忍術研究部得以脫離險境。一行人再次踏上旅程去執行特殊任務。基於認為任務已經完成，萬魔殿便回去了。
desc.zh_cn: {cn万魔殿}的加入让{cn忍术研究部}得以脱离险境。一行人再次踏上旅程去运行特殊任务。基于认为任务已经完成，{cn万魔殿}便回去了。

desc.en: 忍術研究部在雪原裡見到的敵人越來越多，懷疑訊息究竟是怎麼洩露出去的。
desc.jp: 忍術研究部在雪原裡見到的敵人越來越多，懷疑訊息究竟是怎麼洩露出去的。

desc.en: 第六個聖所的守護者還沒現身，本部決定要先加強D.U.白鳥區周圍地區的防禦。美食研究會自願參加防禦作戰…但後來發現凱坦澤在周圍活動。

desc.en: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.jp: 由於有了季的支援，特異現象搜查部兩人的工作得以減少一部分。不過陽葵警告季說，季的裝甲的力量在很大程度上與莉音的要塞都市有關，而在都市被摧毀的情況下，建議季只把它當作普通裝甲看待。
desc.zh_cn: 由于有了{cf季}的支援，{cn特异现象搜查部}两人的工作得以减少一部分。不过{cf阳葵}警告{cf季}说，{cf季}的装甲的力量在很大程度上与{cf莉音}的要塞都市有关，而在都市被摧毁的情况下，建议{cf季}只把它当作普通装甲看待。

desc.en: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。
desc.jp: 除了第六個聖所之外，其他聖所的守護者攻略都已經準備好，所有自治區也完成了防禦準備，就在此時，夏萊附近出現了大量的無名守護者。就在千鈞一髮之際，意外的幫手出現協助防禦夏萊。
desc.zh_cn: 除了第六个圣所之外，{sn其他}圣所的守护者攻略都已经准备好，所有自治区也完成了防御准备，就在此时，{et夏莱}附近出现了大量的无名守护者。就在千钧一发之际，意外的帮手出现协助防御{et夏莱}。

desc.en: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.jp: 所有自治區的防禦作戰、以及聖所守護者的攻略都準備就緒了，作戰即將開始。
desc.zh_cn: 所有自治区的防御作战、以及圣所守护者的攻略都准备就绪了，作战即将开始。

desc.en: 五個聖所和所有自治區的戰鬥全部結束。
desc.jp: 五個聖所和所有自治區的戰鬥全部結束。
desc.zh_cn: 五个圣所和所有自治区的战斗全部结束。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.jp: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.zh_cn: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.jp: Shiroko (Terror) is a student appearing in Volume Final. She's essentially an alternative version of Shiroko, but interacted with Chroma and became a Nameless Goddess. She has close relationships with Phrenapates, who seemed to be the Sensei of her own.
desc.zh_cn: 白子（恐怖）是一名在最终篇中出现的学生。她本质上就是普通白子的另一版本，只不过接触了色彩并成为了无名众神的一员。她与诱骗者的关系很近，后者似乎是她的老师。
